Run Test 0001#PNR}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> </tem:RetrievePnrRequest> </tem:RetrievePNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<tem:ExternalProcessedPaymentRequest> <rad:TransactionInfo> <rad1:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad1:SecurityGUID> <rad1:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:CarrierCode> repetitions:--> <rad:InsertExternalProcessedPayment> <rad:BaseAmount>${#TestCase#Balance}</rad:BaseAmount> <rad:BaseCurrency>${#TestSuite#currency}</rad:BaseCurrency> <rad:CardHolder>${#TestSuite#p_FirstName}</rad:CardHolder> <rad:CardNumber>${#TestSuite#NotApplicable}</rad:CardNumber> <rad:CheckNumber>${#TestSuite#CheckNumber}</rad:CheckNumber> <rad:CurrencyPaid>${#TestSuite#currency}</rad:CurrencyPaid> <rad:CVCode>${empty}</rad:CVCode> <rad:DatePaid>${#TestSuite#DepartureDate}</rad:DatePaid> <rad:ExchangeRateDate>${#TestSuite#ExchangeRateDate}</rad:ExchangeRateDate> <rad:FFNumber xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:PaymentComment>${#TestSuite#Comments}</rad:PaymentComment> <rad:PaymentAmount>${#TestCase#Balance}</rad:PaymentAmount> <rad:PaymentMethod>${#TestSuite#PaymentMethod}</rad:PaymentMethod> <rad:PaymentMethodType>${#TestSuite#PaymentMethod}</rad:PaymentMethodType> <rad:Reference>${#TestSuite#Comments}</rad:Reference> <rad:TerminalID>2</rad:TerminalID> <rad:UserData>${#TestSuite#Comments}</rad:UserData> <rad:UserID>${#TestSuite#UserName}</rad:UserID> <rad:IataNumber>${empty}</rad:IataNumber> <rad:ValueCode>${empty}</rad:ValueCode> <rad:AuthorizationCode>${#TestSuite#AuthorizationCode}</rad:AuthorizationCode> <rad:PaymentReference>${#TestSuite#PaymentReference}</rad:PaymentReference> <rad:ResponseMessage>${#TestSuite#ResponseMessage}</rad:ResponseMessage> <rad:CardCurrency>${#TestSuite#currency}</rad:CardCurrency> <rad:BillingCountry>${#TestSuite#BillingCountry}</rad:BillingCountry> <rad:FingerPrintingSessionID xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:Payor> <rad2:Title>${#TestSuite#p_Title}</rad2:Title> <rad2:NationalityLaguageID>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad2:NationalityLaguageID> <rad2:RelationType>Self</rad2:RelationType> <rad2:WBCID>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad2:WBCID> <rad2:PTCID>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad2:PTCID> <rad2:PTC>${#TestSuite#ID}</rad2:PTC> <rad2:TravelsWithPersonOrgID>-2147483648</rad2:TravelsWithPersonOrgID> <rad2:RedressNumber>${#TestSuite#NotApplicable}</rad2:RedressNumber> <rad2:KnownTravelerNumber>${#TestSuite#NotApplicable}</rad2:KnownTravelerNumber> <rad2:MarketingOptIn>true</rad2:MarketingOptIn> <rad2:UseInventory>false</rad2:UseInventory> <rad2:Address> <rad2:Address1>${#TestSuite#Address1}</rad2:Address1> <rad2:Address2>${empty}</rad2:Address2> <rad2:City>${#TestSuite#City}</rad2:City> <rad2:Comments>${empty}</rad2:Comments> <rad2:Passport>${empty}</rad2:Passport> <rad2:Nationality>${empty}</rad2:Nationality> <rad2:ProfileId>-214</rad2:ProfileId> <rad2:IsPrimaryPassenger>true</rad2:IsPrimaryPassenger> <rad2:ContactInfos> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--<rad2:ContactInfo> <rad2:ContactID>1</rad2:ContactID> xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </rad:Payor> <!--Optional:--> <rad:Result>${empty}</rad:Result> <!--Optional:--> <rad:TransactionID>${empty}</rad:TransactionID>
